text:
DIGIMONDO | Software Engineer | Hamburg, Germany | ONSITE | https://www.digimondo.de/

DIGIMONDO is an IoT startup based in Hamburg. We are looking for frontend/backend/fullstack engineers to help us build new and maintain our existing web applications and work on end-to-end solutions for our customers. Technologies we use include JavaScript (VueJS, NodeJS), Elixir (Phoenix), PostgreSQL, ElasticSearch, RabbitMQ, Docker.

To apply contact jobs@digimondo.de
